name: SX_PROGRAM_MOST_REC_RM
description: This table contains information about the most recent screening program outcome data. The records in this table are Orders (ORD) records that are exams within a screening program.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description: The outcome category ID for the most recent outcome for a screening program calculated for an exam, such as True Negative or True Positive.
